@graph.name: The Sebastian - Vail
@graph.description: Vail, Colorado is one-of-a-kind. For skiers, it is a mountain without equal. As a mountain village, there is no other in America as charming, colorful and international. In the heart of Vail Village, The Sebastian – Vail, a Timbers Resort, captures the magic of this storied place like nowhere else. From personalized experiences and services to our private slopeside Base Camp with ski valets, we attend to every detail, so you can focus on family and fun. Join us for a night or own with us forever. Either way, our Vail resort will beckon you home time and again.

brand.name: The Sebastian - Vail
brand.slogan: Vail Is Like Nothing on Earth.

@graph.name: Luxury Interior Room - Two Queens
@graph.description: Seek comfort, quiet and relaxation in this Interior View Two Queen Room, fitted with two Queen Beds. The perfect option for families, friends and destination travelers. Designed with quality furnishings, modern amenities and limited-edition artwork.

@graph.name: Executive Two-Bedroom Suite
@graph.description: Seek luxury comfort and space in this Executive One-Bedroom Suite, fitted with one king bed. This suite features a separate living and gathering area with an additional bath plus a private ensuite space in the bedroom. The ultimate option for couples, business travelers, families and friends looking to experience Vail.

@graph.name: Four-Bedroom Residential Suite
@graph.description: The Sebastian’s most luxurious and spacious accommodations, this luxury residence includes a large living room with queen sofa sleeper, gourmet kitchen, dining area and balcony. The king bedroom and three guest rooms with one king or two queen beds each have their own HDTVs and private bathrooms.

@graph.name: Two-Bedroom Residential Suite

@graph.name: One-Bedroom Residential Suite
@graph.description: Featuring a spacious separate bedroom with king bed and private ensuite, our luxurious One-Bedroom Residential Suite includes a large living room with a queen sofa sleeper, fully equipped gourmet kitchen, dining area, powder room, rich furnishings and a balcony showcasing views of Vail.

object.name: One-Bedroom Residential Suite reservation
object.lodgingUnitDescription: Featuring a spacious separate bedroom with king bed and private ensuite, our luxurious One-Bedroom Residential Suite includes a large living room with a queen sofa sleeper, fully equipped gourmet kitchen, dining area, powder room, rich furnishings and a balcony showcasing views of Vail.

@graph.name: Grand Galerie Penthouse
@graph.description: Enjoy the most exclusive and impressive penthouse in Vail. Spacious with sophisticated selections of custom furnishings, our Grand Galerie Penthouse features approximately 5,300-square-feet of living space, including 5 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms, media room, dining room with a cathedral skylight and living room with a fireplace and a remarkable Italian handcrafted Gullo Firenze kitchen. This one-of-a-kind penthouse defines mountain luxury with 360-degree views and awe-inspiring art collection featuring notable Mexican artists.
